author: Staff Reporter
text:
The Centre for Sustainable Rural Development and Research Studies, VIT University is organising a mega job mela at the university campus on March 30. Companies from the manufacturing and service sector in the State will participate in the mela, which is being conducted for placement of rural unemployed students.

The mela will be conducted from 9 a.m. to 3 p.m. at the university campus. More than 2,000 job openings in 30 companies will be in the offing. The companies will conduct interviews for the selection of candidates.

Interested candidates with a pass in class VIII, class X, class XII, ITI, diploma, degree, B.Tech, MBA, nursing, catering technology, tailoring, driving or any other qualification can apply. Candidates should bring copies of their educational certificates, passport size photographs, identity proof and resume,.For further details, contact the Project Officer, Centre for Sustainable Rural Development and Research Studies either through email – projectofficer@vit.ac.in or through phone number – 0416-2202156.
title: Job mela at VIT on March 30
